xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 27 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 07:22 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 08:33 <ati94> has joined #ccm 08:33 <ati94> Hi guys! 09:43 <sdumitriu> Hi ati94 10:38 <prasht63> has joined #ccm 10:55 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 10:59 <ati94> Sximitru, are you here? 10:59 <sdumitriu> ati94: Yes 11:00 <ati94> Sorry *sdimitru 11:00 <ati94> I cant wrjte 11:01 <sdumitriu> Yeah, virtual keyboards aren't the best for typing 11:01 <sdumitriu> Don't worry 11:01 <ati94> Yeah, but i am trying to do my best 11:03 <ati94> I dont know if you can help me, but i would like to get more information about one of your projects 11:05 <sdumitriu> Yes, I can 11:05 <sdumitriu> Which project 11:06 <ati94> Could you wait a sec, i have to look for the full title of the project 11:08 <ati94> Development of machine learning methods for modelling the evolution of tumor 11:09 <sdumitriu> OK, that project is coordinated by someone else 11:11 <sdumitriu> Quaid isn't here usually, so you have to contact him by email and ask for further instructions 11:14 <ati94> Okay thank you then. Actually i ve already sent a message to him. (Actually it was just yesterday) but i hoped i could find him here. 11:15 <sdumitriu> He's quite busy, will answer soon 11:16 <ati94> I can understand totally 11:20 <ati94> Bytheway, is there any chance to get this project? I am gonna finish my first year at the university 11:20 <sdumitriu> I don't know, but from what I've seen it's quite a popular project 11:21 <sdumitriu> I think Quaid will be looking for someone more experienced in machine learning, preferably a masters student 11:24 <ati94> Then probably i should look for an other projects then. 11:24 <sdumitriu> It's always good to have a backup plan 11:25 <ati94> But thanks for your help 11:28 <sdumitriu> You're welcome 11:29 <ati94> Bye 11:45 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 12:30 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 13:52 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 14:21 <nairboon> has joined #ccm 16:41 <Not-002> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 pushed 1 commit to master [+1/-28/±2] http://git.io/rtg-2w 16:41 <Not-002> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 723789b - dl from github seems better then a 3Mb build 16:48 <Not-002> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 pushed 1 commit to master [+0/-0/±1] http://git.io/ShKchA 16:48 <Not-002> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 b8ae489 - dumb mistake
